product_identification.name: ErgoComfort Executive Mesh-Back Office Chair
product_identification.intended_use: For professional office environments requiring extended sitting periods (6-8 hours daily) with proper ergonomic support to reduce fatigue and prevent musculoskeletal disorders.

technical_requirements.dimensions: Overall Height: 45-50 inches (114.3-127 cm); Seat Width: 19 inches (48.3 cm) ±0.5 inches; Seat Depth: Adjustable 16-19 inches (40.6-48.3 cm); Backrest Height: 22 inches (55.9 cm) from seat; Base Diameter: 27 inches (68.6 cm)
technical_requirements.weight_capacity: 300 lbs (136.1 kg) for standard use; tested to 330 lbs (149.7 kg) for safety factor
materials: Frame: Die-cast aluminum alloy (ASTM B85) with polished finish
Seat Cushion: High-resilience polyurethane foam, minimum density 1.8 lb/ft³ per BIFMA standards
Backrest: Breathable mesh fabric (100% polyester), minimum tensile strength 200 lbs
Base: 5-star configuration reinforced nylon with glass fiber (minimum 30% glass fiber content)
Casters: Dual-wheel nylon casters with polyurethane tread, BIFMA compliant, available for both carpet and hard floor surfaces

adjustability_features: Seat Height: Pneumatic adjustment range 16-21 inches (40.6-53.3 cm) from floor
Lumbar Support: Height adjustable 6-10 inches (15.2-25.4 cm) from seat; depth adjustment of 1-3 inches (2.5-7.6 cm)
Armrests: 4D adjustable - height range 7-10.5 inches (17.8-26.7 cm) from seat, width adjustment range of 2 inches (5.1 cm), forward/backward range of 2.5 inches (6.4 cm), and 30° inward/outward pivot
Backrest: Recline capability of 95-120 degrees with 5 lockable positions
Seat Pan: Forward/backward tilt adjustment of 0-5 degrees with tension control
Headrest: Height adjustable 0-4 inches (0-10.2 cm), angle adjustment of 0-30 degrees
ergonomic_standards: ANSI/BIFMA X5.1-2017 Office Chairs standard compliance
Meets or exceeds OSHA ergonomic recommendations for computer workstations
Designed to accommodate 5th percentile female to 95th percentile male body dimensions
Supports neutral posture positioning per ergonomic best practices

certifications: Greenguard Gold Certification for low chemical emissions
testing_requirements: Cycle Testing: Minimum 100,000 cycles for seat and back tilt mechanisms
Drop Testing: Per ANSI/BIFMA X5.1 Section 7
Stability Testing: Per ANSI/BIFMA X5.1 Sections 11-13
Arm Strength Testing: Minimum 250 lb static load per ANSI/BIFMA X5.1 Section 14
Caster Testing: 100,000 cycles minimum per ANSI/BIFMA X5.1 Section 19
Supplier must provide test reports from independent laboratory

safety_standards: ANSI/BIFMA X5.1-2017 Office Chairs safety requirements
CARB Phase 2 compliant for formaldehyde emissions
Meets ADA accessibility guidelines for controls and adjustments
environmental_considerations: Minimum 30% recycled content in metal and plastic components
No PBDEs, PFCs, or added antimicrobials in materials
VOC emissions compliant with ANSI/BIFMA X7.1-2011 standard
Disassembly instructions required for proper end-of-life recycling
Packaging must contain minimum 50% recycled content and be recyclable
Product must be designed for disassembly with minimum 90% recyclable materials

identified_issues.issue_description: Screen resolution is described as 'Good quality' which is vague and subjective rather than providing specific technical requirements.
identified_issues.correction: Resolution: 1920 x 1080 pixels (Full HD) minimum. For optimal office productivity, 2560 x 1440 pixels (QHD) is preferred. Must maintain 16:9 aspect ratio with minimum 96 PPI (pixels per inch).

identified_issues.issue_description: Response time is listed as 'Fast' without specific measurable parameters, making it impossible to verify compliance.
identified_issues.correction: Response Time: Maximum 5ms gray-to-gray (GtG) at standard mode. Maximum 1ms MPRT (Moving Picture Response Time) if gaming mode is available. Response time must be tested according to ISO 13406-2 standard.

identified_issues.issue_description: Connectivity is listed as 'Multiple ports' without specifying types, quantities, or required standards.
identified_issues.correction: Connectivity: Minimum requirements: 1x HDMI 2.0 port, 1x DisplayPort 1.4, 2x USB 3.0 downstream ports, 1x USB Type-C port with DisplayPort Alt Mode and 65W Power Delivery capability. All ports must be clearly labeled and accessible.

identified_issues.issue_description: Performance requirements are subjective and unmeasurable with terms like 'work well,' 'clear display,' and 'sufficient brightness.'
identified_issues.correction: Performance Requirements: Brightness: Minimum 300 cd/m² (nits), recommended 350 cd/m²; Contrast Ratio: Minimum 1000:1 static contrast ratio; Color Accuracy: Minimum 95% sRGB color gamut coverage with Delta E < 3; Viewing Angles: Minimum 178° horizontal and vertical; Anti-glare coating required with 3H hardness rating.

identified_issues.issue_description: Compliance section lacks specific standards and certification requirements, using vague terms like 'safety regulations' and 'Energy Star rating preferred.'
identified_issues.correction: Compliance: Must be certified to ENERGY STAR 8.0 for displays (not just 'preferred'); Must meet TCO Certified Generation 9 requirements; Must comply with FCC Class B emissions standards; Must be UL/cUL listed or equivalent; RoHS 3 (EU Directive 2015/863) compliant; Must include California Proposition 65 compliance documentation.
